archimate:Requirement.name: SM.2.3.6c: c) identify and review relevant threats to the organisation on a regular basis to keep pace with the organisation's changing threat profile, often supported by threat modelling (e.g. attack path mapping) to help understand scenarios of concern
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
